resume.title: Software Engineer
description: Implemented Educator Home 2.0, a more UI-friendly dashboard,for university staff members to track courses between institutions
Executed the implementation of Session Assistant Roles, including assisting in the scoping of the project, implementing key functionalities of the feature, and writing verbose unit tests.
Improved productivity of course staff involvement by creating Session Permissions and Session Assistants.
Enhanced efficiency and cohesiveness of test coverage while reducing errors by migrating Enzyme test suites to React Testing Library.
Mentored and onboarded interns and contractors, advised them on best practices, scoped their projects,and wrote their tickets and ticket requirements.

resume.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Executed the implementation of featured on the Educator Admin Dashboard and the Course Staff Management Page.
Boosted staff members’ productivity related to course navigation by implementing Recently Viewed Courses on the Educator Admin Dashboard

resume.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Completed the implementation of the foundational user experience for the company’s mobile application Renaissance.
Spearheaded the development and implementation of the company’s internal-based mobile app AWOL.
Project AWOL - Kept track of the company’s internal games, track points, and user statistics used to calculate users’ Elo/rank within the company against other co-workers/offices.

resume.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Boosted efficiency by implementing key features within the backend of SAP’s Help Portal.
Ensured the stability of SAP’s User Assistance Portal by automating UI tests by creating verbose JavaScript tests.
Improved the efficiency of functions by migrating automation tests written in Protractor.js into Nightwatch.js.
